area.key: Overlays give you a 'modal' dialog across the whole screen
The overlay service has a confirm option built, in with this you can quickly create a confirm dialog, to present your users with a simple option.
Custom overlays give you more control

For more custom options you need to provide a view and a custom controller to manage what happens inside the overlay.

With this method you can control the submit and close process so you can (with a little fangling) have muilt-step processes inside the overlay window.
